topic.title: Zite like Zero-UP
topic.body: Anyone know about a zite where can we upload .rar or similar?

2_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp.body:
i'm italian and i have a 20 mbps ADSL and for the cellphone 5 euros offer. i get 400 minutes, 400 texts and 4 GB,
i have a china phone too. Redmi 3S. 
For the clothes i have only jeans, t-shirt and suits

> [j9j89u77t6r5e4w3](#comment_6_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp): How much do you pay for the ADSL?

about 40 euros. too expensive but i need it

> [j9j89u77t6r5e4w3](#comment_7_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp): You seem to have cheaper mobile deals than we do here but our wifi seems quite a bit cheaper, I guess it all balances out

the mobile offer was a promotion. for the ADSL you're right. i live in a small town so the fiber is only a dream but the price is the same

> [j9j89u77t6r5e4w3](#comment_8_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp): Mid twenties and still in with a sibling and a parent for various reasons and I'm paying roughly $185 per month board. I also pay for the wifi. Together those come to around $210. I'm not in the US, I'm converting from national currency so those are estimates for my bit of the world.

where do you live?

> [j9j89u77t6r5e4w3](#comment_9_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp): Im in the UK

uh, i'd like to study in UK but it's too expensive :/

> [j9j89u77t6r5e4w3](#comment_10_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp): If I was about to start uni I'd do MOOCs instead and pay £70 per certificate rather than what they charge now, its pathetic, it was too expensive when it was £3,500 a year.

what is MOOCS?

> [j9j89u77t6r5e4w3](#comment_11_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp): https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massive_open_online_course
uh, strange. Here nobody know about this

> [j9j89u77t6r5e4w3](#comment_12_1CgkYcGEeiovWDTK7RrPcfXMibaKsBFtGp): Some of the ones like edx.org and coursera will pay for tuition if you don't have the money but because of how low the cost it I think it could be paid off doing a paper round or blogging while you do the course

it's a good alternative but i'd like to come in UK physically for learn english

1509056504_1AL7MPy6rvULDRvLbmsxttSQALdYF.body: is there a site where i can  upload the Logo software file?

1509981721_1MYPi2rwymqQag8yxPGzJgSe591yp.body:
> [c00kie](#comment_2_15qk92Wkzm2iULx54AsBf7DQTyfYpNLdxg): nullchan probably

can you link it, please?
